text: Chadwick Steven McQueen (December 28, 1960 â€“ September 11, 2024) was an American actor, movie producer, martial artist, and race car driver. He was best known for his role as Dutch in the 1984 movie The Karate Kid and its 1986 sequel. His son is actor Steven R. McQueen. McQueen was born in Los Angeles, California. His parents were Steve McQueen and Neile Adams. His acting career began in 1978 and he retired from acting in 2001. In 2020, McQueen suffered a fall and never fully recovered from his injuries. He died on September 11, 2024 from organ failure in Palm Desert, California at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * *McQueen Racing, LLC Category:1960 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from organ failure Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American martial artists Category:American racecar drivers Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:American child actors Category:People from Palm Desert, California
title: Chad McQueen
